    • Constructor Detail

      • Ripple

        public Ripple(int n,
              int size,
              int ttl)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        n - cell count in x an y.
        size - absolute size value of one of the sides of the square that defines the floor, i.e., floor as size*size area.
        ttl - ripple time to live.

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        Description copied from interface: Particle
        Update particle acceleration, velocity, position, age, color, size. Depending on the type of update different particle effects are achieved.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Particle
        Parameters:
        dt - simulation time step.
